From the intersection of Highway 515 and Highway 60 in Fannin County, Georgia, go north to the town of Mineral Bluff.
Horseback riding in Mineral Bluff is a popular attraction.  Call 706-632-4448 ext. 1 for reservations.

value: content=Features several log cabin rentals for vacations in the Mineral Bluff area.

content= Provides beautiful, privately owned luxury vacation cabins in the Mineral Bluff area near Blue Ridge. All of the properties are fully equipped and offer upscale furnishings, hot tubs and fireplaces. Many offer pool tables, game rooms and spectacular year-round mountain views. Cabins are conveniently located near Lake Blue Ridge, white water rafting on the Ocoee River, horseback riding, tubing, hiking and the antique shops on Main Street.
